kv7.8:5.3: Sukhavedaniyaṃ dukkhavedaniyaṃ adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ, sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, phassena sampayuttaṃ, vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, saññāya sampayuttaṃ, cetanāya sampayuttaṃ, cittena sampayuttaṃ, sārammaṇaṃ;
kv7.8:5.4: atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv7.8:5.7: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṃ na dukkhavedaniyaṃ … pe … anārammaṇaṃ;
kv7.8:5.14: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṃ na dukkhavedaniyaṃ … pe … anārammaṇaṃ;
kv7.8:5.17: natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv7.8:6.1: Phasso vipāko, phasso sukhavedaniyo dukkhavedaniyo … pe … sārammaṇo;
kv7.8:6.8: Jarāmaraṇaṃ vipāko, jarāmaraṇaṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ dukkhavedaniyaṃ … pe … sārammaṇaṃ;
kv7.8:7.1: Jarāmaraṇaṃ vipāko, jarāmaraṇaṃ na sukhavedaniyaṃ na dukkhavedaniyaṃ … pe … anārammaṇaṃ;
kv7.8:7.8: Phasso vipāko, phasso na sukhavedaniyo na dukkhavedaniyo … pe … anārammaṇo;
kv7.8:8.1: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:8.3: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:10.1: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:10.3: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:12.1: Kusalānañca akusalānañca dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:12.3: Kusalānañca akusalānañca dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:13.1: Kusalānañca akusalānañca dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, na vattabbaṃ—
kv7.8:13.4: Kusalānañca akusalānañca dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, na vattabbaṃ—
kv7.8:14.4: Nanu atthi dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ appāyukasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammanti?
kv7.8:14.6: Hañci atthi dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ appāyukasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
